test.Description: If type="0" then runs the versit test with performance benchmarking.Number of iterations can be specified as iteration value.Default
If type="1" then runs the versit test

contact.Description: If save="yes" then saves the contact in phonebook. Default
If save="no" then will not save the contact in phonebook

log.Description: If format="xml" then runs the versit test with xml file logging enabled.Default
If format="vb" then runs the versit test with verbose benchmarking output.
If format="v1" then runs the versit test with verbose level 1 output.
